title: runtime: crash with garbage collector found invalid heap pointer
body:
C:\programs>go version
go version go1.4 windows/386

C:\programs>gcc -v
Using built-in specs.
COLLECT_GCC=gcc
COLLECT_LTO_WRAPPER=C:/TDM-GCC-32/bin/../libexec/gcc/mingw32/4.9.2/lto-wrapper.exe
Target: mingw32
Configured with: ../../../src/gcc-4.9.2/configure --build=mingw32 --enable-languages=ada,c,c++,fort
--enable-libgomp --enable-lto --enable-graphite --enable-libstdcxx-debug --enable-threads=posix --e
c-runtime-libs --enable-fully-dynamic-string --enable-libstdcxx-threads --enable-libstdcxx-time --w
werror --disable-nls --disable-win32-registry --disable-symvers --enable-cxx-flags='-fno-function-s
tions -DWINPTHREAD_STATIC' --prefix=/mingw32tdm --with-local-prefix=/mingw32tdm --with-pkgversion=t
ceptions --with-bugurl=http://tdm-gcc.tdragon.net/bugs
Thread model: posix
gcc version 4.9.2 (tdm-1)

runtime: garbage collector found invalid heap pointer *(0x136c860+0x23c)=0x318b0000 s=nil
fatal error: invalid heap pointer
